languages.text: "Думаю, ты меня понимаешь. Ведь в свой особый день ты решил{mf||а} очистить свою столицу от воров и преступников".

traits.locale_text: "Думаю, ты меня понимаешь. Ведь в свой особый день ты решил{mf||а} очистить свою столиц от воров и преступников".

languages.text: "I believe you understand me. After all, on this glorious day, you saw fit to cleanse your capital of thieves and criminals."
languages.original_text: "Думаю, ты меня понимаешь. Ведь в свой особый день ты решил{mf||а} очистить свою столицу от воров и преступников".

traits.locale_text: "I believe you understand me. After all, on this glorious day, you saw fit to cleanse your capital of thieves and criminals."
"I believe you understand me. After all, on this glorious day, you saw fit to cleanse your capital of thieves and criminals."
"I believe you understand me. After all, on this glorious day, you saw fit to cleanse your capital of thieves and criminals."
"I believe you understand me. After all, on this glorious day, you saw fit to cleanse your capital of thieves and criminals."
"I believe you understand me. After all, on this glorious day, you saw fit to cleanse your capital of thieves and criminals."

languages.text: 「お前なら分かってくれるだろう。結局のところ、首都の泥棒や犯罪者を浄化することが今日という栄えある日に適切だと考えたのだから」
languages.original_text: "I believe you understand me. After all, on this glorious day, you saw fit to cleanse your capital of thieves and criminals."

traits.locale_text: 「お前なら分かってくれるだろう。結局のところ、首都の泥棒や犯罪者を浄化することが今日という栄えある日に適切だと考えたのだから」

languages.text: “我相信你能理解我。毕竟在如此重大的日子里，你下令处决首都里的盗贼与罪犯。”
languages.original_text: "I believe you understand me. After all, on this glorious day, you saw fit to cleanse your capital of thieves and criminals."

traits.locale_text: “我相信你能理解我。毕竟在如此重大的日子里，你下令处决首都里的盗贼与罪犯。”

languages.text: «Creo que me entiende. A fin de cuentas, en este día glorioso ha tenido a bien purgar su capital de ladrones y criminales».
languages.original_text: "I believe you understand me. After all, on this glorious day, you saw fit to cleanse your capital of thieves and criminals."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que me entiende. A fin de cuentas, en este día glorioso ha tenido a bien purgar su capital de ladrones y criminales».

languages.text: « Je pense que vous me comprenez. Après tout, en ce jour de fête, vous avez décidé d'expurger votre capitale de ses voleurs et de ses criminels. »
languages.original_text: "I believe you understand me. After all, on this glorious day, you saw fit to cleanse your capital of thieves and criminals."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense que vous me comprenez. Après tout, en ce jour de fête, vous avez décidé d'expurger votre capitale de ses voleurs et de ses criminels. »

languages.text: "Ich denke, Ihr versteht mich. Denn schließlich hieltet Ihr es an jenem glorreichen Tag für angebracht, Eure Hauptstadt von Dieben und Verbrechern zu säubern."
languages.original_text: "I believe you understand me. After all, on this glorious day, you saw fit to cleanse your capital of thieves and criminals."

traits.locale_text: "Ich denke, Ihr versteht mich. Denn schließlich hieltet Ihr es an jenem glorreichen Tag für angebracht, Eure Hauptstadt von Dieben und Verbrechern zu säubern."

languages.text: "Beni anladığını farz ediyorum. Ne de olsa bu görkemli günde başkentini hırsız ve suçlulardan temizlemeyi uygun gördün."
languages.original_text: "I believe you understand me. After all, on this glorious day, you saw fit to cleanse your capital of thieves and criminals."

traits.locale_text: "Beni anladığını farz ediyorum. Ne de olsa bu görkemli günde, başkentini hırsızlar ve suçlulardan temizlemeyi uygun gördün."
